sentences.sContent: The speaker can extemporize on any of a number of subjects.
sentences.sContent_eng: The speaker can extemporize on any of a number of subjects.
sentences.sCn: 该演讲人对若干题目中的任一个都能即席发言。

sentences.sContent: They cannibalized three aircraft carriers and a number of warships to form a task force.
sentences.sContent_eng: They cannibalized three aircraft carriers and a number of warships to form a task force.
sentences.sCn: 他们抽调了三艘航空母舰和一些战舰组成一支特遣部队。
